price: Na hakika sisi tutarudi kwa Mola wetu Mlezi.
footnotes: Na hakika sisi ni wenye kurejea kwa Muumba wetu baada ya maisha haya, ili ahisabiwe kila mmoja kwa iliyo tanguliza mikono yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
